title.en: Kiss de Tokashita Sono Ato ni

altTitles.ja: キスで溶かしたそのあとに

altTitles.ja-ro: Kisu de Tokashita sono ato ni

description.en: By the decision of his parents, university student Aise Hiro is currently freeloading at the house of his friend's older brother, Onosawa Mizuki. Mizuki is a handsome accountant and the ideal husband and Hiro is basking in his good looks. At first glance, their life together is pleasant, with Hiro making meals and waking Mizuki in the mornings. But there's a problem: Hiro is romantically interested in men, and Mizuki is his first love! One day, while feeling horny, the worst happens when Mizuki sees Hiro masturbating. Even worse, everything is discovered, including his posts on social media that he's "taking applications for a boyfriend" and that he was provoked by an erotic message. However, Mizuki says something completely unexpected: "If you're that frustrated, why not have a fake romance with me?
description.es-la:
Sinopsis: La historia trata de un estudiante universitario, Hiroshi Aise, que se aloja en casa del hermano de su amigo, Mizuki Onozawa, debido al acuerdo de sus padres. Mizuki es un apuesto contador y un marido ideal, y a Hiroshi le gustan los chicos guapos. Le prepara la comida y lo despierta por la mañana, pero hay un problema: el interés amoroso de Hiroshi es un hombre, y Mizuki es su primer amor...
Un día, una de las peores cosas que le ocurre a Hiroshi es que Mizuki lo ve masturbándose. Pero entonces Mizuki dice algo inesperado: "Si estás tan frustrado, ¿te gustaría tener un pseudo-romance conmigo?"
